Package org.cads.ev3.middleware.hal

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICaDSEV3Robot
    Interface for gripper
    ICaDSEV3RobotFeedBackListener
    Interface for Feedback cycle
    ICaDSEV3RobotGripper
    Interface for grap and release
    ICaDSEV3RobotInit  
    ICaDSEV3RobotMotors
    Interface for motor access
    ICaDSEV3RobotRotateHorizontal
    Interface of horizontal movement
    ICaDSEV3RobotRotateVertical
    Interface of vertical movement
    ICaDSEV3RobotSensors
    Interface for sensor access
    ICaDSEV3RobotStatusListener
    Interface Status exchange between components
    ICaDSEV3WatchdogAction
    Watchdog interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CaDSEV3Robot
    Combine all components: RotateVertical - To control vertical movement RotateHorizontal - To control horizontal movement Gripper - To control grip and release
    CaDSEV3RobotButtons
    Implements functionality for the Button provided by the lego brick
    CaDSEV3RobotGripper
    Implements the grapper grap and release functionality
    CaDSEV3RobotHCI  
    CaDSEV3RobotMotors
    Access to the motor control of the lego gripper
    CaDSEV3RobotRotateHorizontal
    Implementation class Controls the horizontal movement
    CaDSEV3RobotRotateVertical
    Class to access the vertical movement
    CaDSEV3RobotSensors
    Controls lego gripper sensors
    CaDSEV3RobotSensorUS  
    CaDSEV3RobotWatchDog
    A simple abstract watchdog construct helps e.g. to control the motors
